name: WLED
comment: LED Stripe and Matrix Controller Firmware. All effects are LED stripe effects, except: # are LED matrix only; + is matrix & stripe; * are audio loudness reactive; ** are audio frequency reactive; ~ don't use palette, just colors

capabilities.comment: Solid primary color on all LEDs
Blinks between primary and secondary color. Parameter = Speed, Duty cycle; Colors = Fx, Bg
Fades between primary and secondary color. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx, Bg
Switches between primary and secondary, switching LEDs one by one, start to end. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Same as Wipe, but uses random colors. Parameter = Speed
Applies a new random color to all LEDs. Parameter = Speed, Fade time
Switches between primary and secondary, switching LEDs one by one, start to end to start. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Sets each LED to a random color. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Smooth
Cycle all LEDs through the rainbow colors. Parameter = Speed, Saturation
Displays rainbow colors along the whole strip. Parameter = Speed, Size
A single primary colored light wanders between start and end. Parameter = Speed, # of dots, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Same as Scan but uses two lights starting at both ends. Parameter = Speed, # of dots, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Fades smoothly between primary and secondary color. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx, Bg
Pattern of one lit and two unlit LEDs running. Parameter = Speed, Gap size; Colors = Fx, Bg
Same as Theater but uses colors of the rainbow. Parameter = Speed, Gap size; Colors = Bg
Sine Waves scrolling. Parameter = Speed, Wave width; Colors = Fx, Bg
Sawtooth Waves scrolling. Parameter = Speed, Width; Colors = Fx, Bg
Random LEDs light up in the primary color with secondary as background. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Fills LEDs with primary in random order, then off again. Parameter = Repeat speed, Dissolve speed, Random; Colors = Fx, Bg
Fills LEDs with random colors in random order, then off again. Parameter = Repeat speed, Dissolve speed; Colors = Bg
Single random LEDs light up in the primary color for a short time, secondary is background. Parameter = Speed, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
All LEDs are lit in the primary color, single random LEDs turn off for a short time. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Overlay; Colors = Bg, Fx
All LEDs are lit in the primary color, multiple random LEDs turn off for a short time. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Overlay; Colors = Bg, Fx
All LEDs are lit in the secondary color, all LEDs flash in a single short burst in primary color. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx, Bg
Same as strobe, cycles through the rainbow. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Bg
All LEDs are lit in the secondary color, all LEDs flash in several short bursts in primary color. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Same as blink, cycles through the rainbow. Parameter = Frequency, Blink duration; Colors = Fx, Bg
Section of varying length running. Parameter = Speed, Width; Colors = Fx, Bg
2 LEDs in primary color running on secondary. Parameter = Speed, Width; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Like Chase but leaves trail of random color. Parameter = Speed, Width; Colors = Fx, Cs
Like 28 but leaves trail of rainbow. Parameter = Speed, Width; Colors = Fx, Bg
2 LEDs flash in secondary color while the rest is lit in primary. The flashing LEDs wander from start to end. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Bg, Fx
Like Chase Flash, but the 2 LEDs flash in random colors and leaves a random color behind. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx, Bg
Like Chase, but the 2 LEDs light up in rainbow colors and leave a primary color trail. Parameter = Speed, Size; Colors = Bg
Shifting Red-Amber-Green-Blue pattern. Parameter = Speed, Saturation; Colors = 1, 2, 3
Emulates a traffic light. Parameter = Speed, US style; Colors = Bg
Like Sweep, but uses random colors. Parameter = Speed
Pattern of n LEDs primary and n LEDs secondary moves along the strip. Parameter = Speed, Width; Colors = Fx, Bg
Simulation of the Aurora Borealis. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = 1, 2, 3
Flush bands random hues along the string. Parameter = Speed, Zone size
Dot moves between ends, leaving behind a fading trail. Parameter = Speed, Fade rate; Colors = Fx, Bg
Dot moves from start to end, leaving behind a fading trail. Parameter = Speed, Fade rate; Colors = Fx, Bg
Random color blobs light up, then fade again. Parameter = Frequency; Colors = Fx, Bg
Like Fireworks, but the blobs move. Parameter = Speed, Spawning rate; Colors = Fx, Bg
Falling blocks stack. Parameter = Speed, Width, One color; Colors = Fx, Bg
LEDs randomly flickering. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx
Moves a saturation gradient of the primary color along the strip. Parameter = Speed, Spread; Colors = Fx, Bg
Moves a sawtooth pattern along the strip. Parameter = Speed, Fade; Colors = Fx, Bg
Outdated since WLED 0.14+ replaced by 'Two Dot'
Inspired by twinkle style Christmas lights. Parameter = Speed, # of flashers; Colors = Fx, Bg
Two areas sweeping. Parameter = Speed, Dot size, Overlay; Colors = 1, 2, Bg
Like Colortwinkle, but starting from all lit. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Sine waves in both directions. Parameter = Speed, Wave width; Colors = L, Bg, R
Outdated since WLED 0.14+ replaced by 'Chase 2'
Like Chase, but with 3 colors. Parameter = Speed, Size; Colors = 1, 2, 3
Like Wipe but turns LEDs off as  third color . Parameter = Speed; Colors = 1, 2, 3
Fades the whole strip from primary color to secondary color to off. Parameter = Speed; Colors = 1, 2, 3
Short random white strobe similar to a lightning bolt. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
Two  eyes  running on opposite sides of the strip. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
Like Scanner, but creates multiple trails
Like Scanner, but with two dots running on opposite sides. Parameter = Speed, Fade rate; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Flush random hues along the string. Parameter = Speed
Areas of primary and secondary colors move between opposite ends, combining colors where they touch
Rainbow cycling with brightness variation. Parameter = Speed
Eight colored dots running, leaving trails. Parameter = Speed, Trail
Running color palette. Parameter = Cycle speed
Simulates flickering fire in red and yellow. Parameter = Cooling, Spark rate, Boost
Like Pride 2015, but uses palettes. Parameter = Speed, Hue; Colors = Fx
Pulses moving back and forth on palette. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
Noise pattern. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
Fast Noise shift pattern. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
Fast Noise shift pattern. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
Noise shift pattern. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
Noise sparkle pattern. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
LEDs light up randomly in random colors and fade off again. Parameter = Fade speed, Spawn speed
Calm palette waving. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx
The primary color creates a trail of randomly decaying color. Parameter = Speed, Trail length; Colors = Fx
Smoothly animated meteor. Parameter = Speed, Trail length; Colors = Fx
Shows primary and secondary color on alternating LEDs. All LEDs fade to their opposite color and back again. Parameter = Speed, Smoothness; Colors = 1, 2
Effect resembling random water ripples. Parameter = Speed, Wave #, Overlay; Colors = Bg
FastLED gentle twinkling with slow fade in/out. Parameter = Speed, Twinkle rate
Twinkling with fast in / slow out. Parameter = Speed, Twinkle rate
One Pair of blinking eyes at random intervals along strip. Parameter = Duration, Eye fade time, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
Speed sets number of LEDs on, intensity sets off. Parameter = Fg size, Bg size; Colors = Fg, Bg
Solid Pattern with three colors. Parameter = Size; Colors = 1, 2, 3
Solid lights with even distance. Parameter = Spread, Width, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
Spots, getting bigger and smaller. Parameter = Spread, Width, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
Rainbow with white sparkles. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Overlay; Colors = 1, 2, Glitter color
Flicker resembling a candle flame. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Exploding multicolor fireworks. Parameter = Chance, Fragments, Overlay; Colors = Bg
one dimension fireworks with flare. Parameter = Gravity, Firing side; Colors = Fx, Bg
Bouncing ball effect. Parameter = Gravity, # of balls, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Fastled sinusoidal moving eye. Parameter = Speed, Trail; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Sinelon from both directions. Parameter = Speed, Trail; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Sinelon in rainbow colours. Parameter = Speed, Trail; Colors = Cs
popping kernels. Parameter = Speed, Intensity, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg, Cs
Water dripping effect. Parameter = Gravity, # of drips, Overlay; Colors = Fx, Bg
Plasma lamp. Parameter = Phase, Intensity; Colors = Fx
Lights up a percentage of segment. Parameter = % of fill, One color; Colors = Fx, Bg
Like ripple, but with a dimly lit changing background. Parameter = Speed, Wave #
led strip pulsing rhythm similar to a heart beat. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Gentle ocean waves. Parameter = Speed, Angle
Like candle effect, but each LED has it's own flicker pattern. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Like Glitter, but with solid color background. Parameter = Intensity; Colors = Bg, Glitter color
Simulates a gradual sunrise or sunset. Speed sets: 0 static sun, 1 60: sunrise time in minutes,60 120: sunset time in minutes 60, above:  breathing  rise and set. Parameter = Time [min], Width
Sine waves (in sourcecode). Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Twinkle effect with fade-in. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Peaceful noise that's slow and with gradually changing palettes. Parameter = Speed, Scale
Controllable sine waves
Noisy sine waves. Parameter = Speed, Intensity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Blend of palette and spot effects. Parameter = Speed, Zones
Birds flying in a circle formation. Parameter = Speed, Gap size; Colors = Fx, Bg
Moving spotlights. Parameter = Speed, # of shadows; Colors = Fx
Spins, slows, reverses directions. Parameter = Speed, Intensity
Outdated since WLED 0.14+ replaced by 'Chase 2 red/white'
Blends random colors across palette. Parameter = Shift speed, Blend speed
TV light spill simulation. Parameter = Speed, Intensity
Like Dynamic, but with smooth palette blends. Parameter = Speed, Intensity
Circling ships with fading trails. Homage to 80s spaceship shooter games. Parameter = Speed, Blur
Bees darting from flower to flower. Parameter = Speed, Blur
Color changing ghost riding a kite... in a tornado. Parameter = Fade rate, Blur
No really, they are blobs. Parameter = Speed, # blobs, Blur; Colors = Fx

Edit segment name to set text (variables #DATE, #TIME, #DDMM, #MMDD, #HHMM, #HH, #MM; suffix with 0 to have leading 0s, i.e. #DATE0). Use segment grouping to increase text size on a large matrix. Parameter = Speed, Y Offset, Trail, Font size, Gradient, Overlay, 0; Colors = Fx, Bg, Gradient
Spinning arms that adds and removes nodes as it winds and unwinds. Parameter = Fade, Blur
Distorted sine waves with a psychedelic flair. Parameter = Speed, Scale
Like soap bubbles, but lasts longer. Parameter = Speed, Smoothness
A cephalopod stuck in a whirlpool. Parameter = Speed, Offset X, Offset Y, Legs
If a bunch of eucaryotes went to a sports stadium and did the wave, it would look exactly like this. Parameter = Speed, Amplitude 1, Amplitude 2, Amplitude 3
Random pixels. Parameter = Fade rate, # of pixels; Colors = Fx, Bg
Pixels emanating from center. Parameter = Speed, Sensitivity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Juggling balls. Parameter = Speed, # of balls; Colors = Fx, Bg
Similar to Matrix. Parameter = Speed, Brightness; Colors = Fx, Bg
Volume reactive vu-meter with gravity and perlin noise. Parameter = Rate of fall, Sensitivity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Sine wave based plasma. Parameter = Phase, # of pixels; Colors = Fx, Bg
Blast coloured puddles based on volume. Parameter = Fade rate, Puddle size; Colors = Fx, Bg
Perlin noise emanating from center. Parameter = Fade rate, Max. length; Colors = Fx, Bg
Volume reactive vu-meter. Parameter = Fade rate, Width; Colors = Fx, Bg
Maps the major frequencies from the incoming signal to colors in the HSV color space. Parameter = Speed, Sound effect, Low bin, High bin, Pre-amp
The temporal tail for this animation starts at the beginning of the Segment rather than in the center of the segment. Parameter = Speed, Sound effect, Low bin, High bin, Sensivity
A 16x16 graphic equalizer. Parameter = Fade speed, Ripple decay, # of bands, Color bars; Colors = Fx, Peaks
A volume AND FFT version of a Waterfall that has 'beat' support. Parameter = Speed, Adjust color, Select bin, Volume (min); Colors = Fx, Bg
Random pixels coloured by frequency. Parameter = Fade rate, Starting color and # of pixels
Undefined in WLED >= 0.14+
A perlin noise based volume reactive fire routine. Parameter = Speed, Intensity
Blast coloured puddles randomly up and down the strand with the 'beat'. Parameter = Fade rate, Puddle size, Select bin, Volume (min); Colors = Fx, Bg
Using perlin noise as movement for different frequency bins. Parameter = Speed of perlin movement, Fade rate; Colors = Fx, Bg
Parameter = Speed, Scale
Using Perlin Noise for movement. Parameter = Speed, # of pixels, Fade rate; Colors = Fx, Bg
Peak detection triggers ripples. Parameter = Fade rate, Max # of ripples, Select bin, Volume (min); Colors = Fx, Bg
Using Perlin Noise for fire. Parameter = X scale, Y scale
Boxes moving around. Parameter = Blur
Undefined in WLED >= 0.14+
A very cool DNA like pattern. Parameter = Scroll speed, Blur
The Matrix, on a 2D matrix. Parameter = Speed, Spawning rate, Trail, Custom color; Colors = Spawn, Trail
A cool plasma type effect. Parameter = Speed
Map the loudest frequency throughout the length of the LED's. Parameter = Fade rate, Starting color; Colors = Fx, Bg
Volume reactive vu-meter from center with gravity and perlin noise. Parameter = Rate of fall, Sensitivity; Colors = Fx, Bg
Volume reactive vu-meter from center with gravity. Volume provides index to (time rotating) palette colour. Parameter = Rate of fall, Sensitivity; Colors = Fx, Bg
VU Meter from center. Log of frequency is index to center colour. Parameter = Rate of fall, Sensivity; Colors = Fx, Bg
An effect emanating from the center to the edges. Parameter = Speed
A 2D wall of reactivity running from bottom to top. Parameter = Scroll speed, # of bands
Undefined in WLED >= 0.14+
Travelling waves. Parameter = Speed, Blur
Flash an fftResult bin per frame and then blur/fade. Parameter = Fade rate, Blur; Colors = Fx, Color mix
A rotating kaleidoscope. Parameter = Rotation speed, Blur amount
Noise waves with some sound. Parameter = Amplification, Sensitivity
The sun! Doesn't support segments. Parameter = Variance, Brightness
Rotating rays of color. Parameter = Speed, # of lines, Blur, Gradient, Dots
Animated Julia set fractal named after mathematician Gaston Julia. Parameter = Max iterations per pixel, X center, Y center, Area size; Colors = Fx
Undefined in WLED >= 0.14+
Undefined in WLED >= 0.14+
Undefined in WLED >= 0.14+
Scrolling game of life. Parameter = Speed; Colors = Fx, Bg
Plaid pattern of horizontal and vertical bands. Makes a great kilt. Parameter = X scale, Y scale, Sharpness
The northern lights. Parameter = Speed, Scale
Several blurred circles. Looks good with pink plasma palette. Supports AGC. Parameter = Speed, Sensitivity, Blur; Colors = Bg Swirl
A frequency based Lissajous pattern. Parameter = X frequency, Fade rate, Speed; Colors = Fx
Moving patterns. Parameter = X frequency, Y frequency, Blur
A ball of plasma. Parameter = Speed, Fade, Blur
Strip with rotating colours. Parameter = Hue speed, Effect speed
A moving plasma. Parameter = X scale, Y scale, Speed; Colors = Fx
Dots revolving in a circle while the camera. Parameter = Speed, Dot distance, Fade rate, Blur
Spiraling DNA pattern. Parameter = Scroll speed, Y frequency
Colorful dots orbiting a white black hole. Parameter = Fade rate, Outer Y freq., Outer X freq., Inner X freq., Inner Y freq., Solid; Colors = Fx
Beat waves and phase shifting. Looks OK in 2D'ish as well. Parameter = Speed, Brightness variation, Starting color, Range of colors, Color variation; Colors = Fx
Colours the same for each note between octaves, with sine wave going back and forth.; Colors = Fx, Bg
The WLED mascot rocking to your tunes. Parameter = Color speed, Dance; Colors = Head palette, Arms & Legs, Eyes & Mouth
Undefined final WLED effect slots, should have no effects .. tbd

capability.comment: Controls mirror & reverse segment options = 4 macro parts for 1D. The effect option channel is divided into 128 macro parts to control the various states a 2D segment can be in. Using 2D effect options on a 1D strip has no effect.
